Sounds like you are having fun messing with it! Is the reset action needed or something you can change?
   
  Misty

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           I'm feeding th eRNG directly to the serial input, no gates. I have the reset pin floating, whichg allows fora wave fo the hand, or anything near the pin to cause a reset, followed by "Ready". 
 
 Frank-S
